title: SQL Server Training
description: Mindmajix SQL Server Training furnishes students with the knowledge and skills to design and develop the SQL Server database. The course focuses on the primary features and tools of SQL Server for developing a database. You’ll understand how to alter tables using T-SQL and work with SELECT statements, SQL queries, indexes, triggers, transaction types, and more. This course includes all the topics you need to master to advance your development skills and clear the SQL Server certification exam.
what_will_learn: |SQL architecture, database types, and client/server relation|Views, Stored Procedures, and Modifying data using T-SQL|Deploying different functions and operators to design relational databases|Understand Trigger, creation of Triggers, and managing Triggers|Using records to search, sort, index, and group|
prerequisites: What are the prerequisites for the SQL Server course?There are no specific prerequisites to learn SQL Server. Basic knowledge of RDBMS is helpful but not mandatory.
target_students: |SQL and Database Administrators|Software Developers|Business Intelligence professionals|Project Managers|Big Data and Hadoop Professionals|Business Analysts and Managers|Individuals aspiring for a career in SQL development|
instructor_bio: Having 13+ years of experience working closely with industry, Venkat is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged Microsoft Business Intelligence and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.
review|1|review: I have opted for SQL Server Training at Mindmajix. I must say a great amount of information has been clearly communicated by the experienced trainer which helped me gain deeper knowledge of the subject. And also thanks for their 24*7 support.
review|2|review: The Mindmajix classes for SQL Server Training were consistent and the material provided was highly relevant. I felt the complete DBA course was best organized.
review|3|review: I have recently passed my SQL Server Certification exam. All thanks to Mindmajix and their trainers for inspiring me to opt this career.
content: ['SQL Server Introduction & Installation', 'SQL Server Database Design', 'SQL Server Table', 'SQL Server Data', 'Referential Integrity', 'SQL Server Operators And Functions', 'Rules & Functions', 'Joins', 'Tables', 'Joins In SQL Server', 'Subqueries in SQL', 'T-SQL Programming Constructs', 'Conditional Statements', 'Work with Procedures', 'SQL Server Procedure', 'Temporary Tables', 'Constraints', 'SQL Server BI', 'Data Flow', 'Cursors', 'Practice Test and Interview Questions']
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified SQL Server Professionals
